metadata.synopsis: One-liners for the murderer of the Brampton Culling vignette.  He's in his little world, absorbed by his murder.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to 52, 13, -123 and talk to the NPC standing over the corpse.

0.speaker: 1f722042-94fe-4538-b686-17fb5376cbc9
0.text: I had to. If I didn't, she would've slit my throat. She's an agent of the Absolute!
0.context: NodeContext: Still mostly talkimg to himself; insistent

1.speaker: 1f722042-94fe-4538-b686-17fb5376cbc9
1.text: Oh gods, the blood... I... I'm sorry... I'm so sorry.
